body.name: AUVON Lifting Cushions for Hemorrhoids with Scientific Center Hole & U-Shaped Cutout, Orthopedic Pain Relief for Tailbone, Coccyx, Prostate, Postpartum Pregnancy & After Surgery Sitting Relief

features: Scientifical Hollow, Real Benefits. This orthopedic donut cushion for hemorrhoids with a scientific central hole is developed based on anatomy. Different from other hemorrhoid pillow with large holes on the market, this butt pillow with an appropriately sized hole supports the sit bone while ensuring the hemorrhoid area remains suspended, scientifically reducing the discomfort caused by the central collapse of the traditional large-hole cushion when sitting for a long time.

Ergonomic Designs, Maximum Comfort. This lifting cushion for tailbone pain is crafted with 3 ergonomic designs. The ergonomic U-shaped cutout avoids coccyx compression and sciatic nerve pressure. The inclined support zone conforms to the thighs for blood circulation. The contoured shape fits the pelvis for support and effectively soothes soreness.

Relieve Sitting Pressure. Prolonged sitting easily causes coccyx compression and sciatic nerve pressure even hemorrhoids. This sciatica pain relief pillow corrects your sitting posture to promote thigh blood circulation and offers long-lasting comfort when long sitting. This seat cushion for office chairs and home use caters to the needs of men and women alike, which elevates your seating experience to a new level of comfort.

Premium Memory Foam, Never Flatten. The doughnut pillow adopts high-density memory foam instead of cheap polyurethane foam and offers lasting support and temperature-sensitive contouring to relieve bottom pressure and hemorrhoid pain. Choose AUVON coccyx cushion to start your comfortable and healthy sitting experience.

Breathable & Durable. Featuring a smooth and breathable cover of honeycomb mesh texture to prevent heat buildup, this ergonomic seat cushion can effectively reduce the risk of bedsores from long sitting. The cover is removable & washable for daily cleaning. The anti-slip bottom ensures sitting stability and safety. The dimensions: 17.2''L x 16.2''W x 3.1''H.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High quality seat cushion
reviews.reviewText: My husband and I have both been having pain or soreness in our tailbone area. This seat cushion has been helping a lot with relieving stress in that area. I like that this cushion is a full seat and not just a circle ring like some others. I would recommend this cushion to anyone that suffers from pain from sitting too long, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Really helps with lower back pain
reviews.reviewText: Got this little cushion to use in an office chair to help with lower back pain.It is comfortable to sit on, and did not feel awkward using it.It was a little firmer than anticipated at first, but compresses a little more now after being used.It really does help with lower back pain, and makes sitting for extended periods easier.It seems to be very sturdy and well made, but only time will tell how well it holds up and for how long.I would recommend it to anyone who suffers from lower back pain, and could use some relief.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I work as a professional nail technician, which means I sit a lot of the time for my job and this was so comfortable for me. The size is perfect and I’m on the heavier side as well. The quality is also very top-tier and it really helps my bottom not feel so numb after a long workday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cushion for someone who spends a lot of time sitting.
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product for those who spend a lot of their time sitting, whether driving or at an office job. It gives extra support and comfort to help relieve lower back and sitting pains. It works great in most vehicle seats but I wouldn't recommend for smaller space vehicles such as older jeeps that have less space between the seat and roof, specifically if you're taller. Otherwise, it is very soft and a nice size!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Not as comfortable as it looks.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this because I sit in an office chair for over 8 hours a day and it was starting to hurt my behind and back.This cushion has elevated much of the discomfort. As others have said it does soften up as it gets warm, but I haven't noticed a loss in support. It stays comfortable and honestly, it seems to be a little more comfortable when you sink into it and you get more side support.I think it's a good purchase if your backside fits it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Well, as others have said, if you have a broader caboose, this one may be too small for you.
reviews.reviewText: Yes, I read the other reviews on here and thought I'm not THAT wide, I should fit fine. Nope.I am familiar with the "original" sculpted office seat cushion marketed around lately, but have not test driven it, so I can't really compare this one to that. I will say, pay attention to the other reviews on here and mine when I say you need to be a certain size for this to fit you properly and with comfort. I'm a size 12 in women's clothing, and this just felt uncomfortable, and it fell flat - no support. I will say the material covering the cushion and its construction appears to be of quality and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable. Memory form keeps shape.
reviews.reviewText: This donut cushion is quite comfortable.It does a good job relieving tailbone pain I would get from setting in hard seats that had no cushion. My buttocks sometimes would get kind of numb for having to sit for a few hours while getting my hair braided.I will be bringing this the next time I set up an appointment.The foam still has its shape.It didn’t flatten out like most memory foam products I tested do.The honeycomb fabric doesn’t feel rough.The anti slip base kept the cushion in place when I sat in my office chair 🪑.I never noticed an unpleasant smell when it came fresh out the box.The cover can be removed and washed once it gets dirty or gain any smell.I really can’t think of any complaints besides mines having minor stitching 🧵 issues with the honeycomb mesh.
